input.sentences: i went shopping in location location today .
the buildings all looked very similar .
my favorite store on the street did n't even have a sign .
i realized i was shopping on a campus and not downtown .
and as soon as i realized that i ran right into the universities main student center .
output.sentences: Nearby to the college campus, there was a lively shopping district.
The area was designed to keep in theme with the look of the college.
There were a lot of bright windows to see inside the store.
The campus clock signaled that it was nearly lunchtime and the shops and restaurants were about to hit a rush.
After lunch, everyone was back into class.
